A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was a hard movie to decide on because there's a lot that I enjoyed about the movie but also a lot that I disagreed with.

*Spoilers AHEAD!!*

First the things I liked;
- The choreography was fantastic.
- The visuals stunning.
- I actually really enjoyed all the scenes with Rey and Kylo\, as well as all the choices they made for the characters.
- I actually like that Snoke was killed off\, because it was unexpected and helps better develop Kylo as the main villain.

Alright now the things I didn't like;
- Pretty much most of the decisions about Luke. I very much agree with what Mark Hamil said should be done with the character\, if you haven't watched his interview I would recommend it. I'm not against killing off his character but I felt it could have been done a lot better.
- The humour just felt off\, like not a star wars movie.
- The throwaway asian character\, I honestly can't remember her name because she left so little of an impact.
- Princess Leia should have been the one killed in this film.
- The Casino scenes were kinda pointless. You could argue that this was done to introduce DJ and give Finn more development\, but if DJ doesn't have a big part in the next movie it's rather pointless.

Overall I think it was a good movie\, I just think that the above decisions hurt the film.
